<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// single-precision is stored as double-precision on PPC in registers, so</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277" lineLink="#ab2ac86b2700995733bbb9bbbe48641fa"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint32&#95;t <a href="#ab2ac86b2700995733bbb9bbbe48641fa">findContiguousZerosAtLeast</a>(uint64&#95;t Imm, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Num) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Shift right the Imm by (48 - LZ) bits to construct a negtive 16 bits value,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// therefore we can take advantage of LI&#39;s sign-extension semantics, and then</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// mask them off after rotation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// +--LZ--||-15-bit-||--TO--+     +-------------|--16-bit--+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// |00000001bbbbbbbbb1111111| -&gt;  |00000000000001bbbbbbbbb1|</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// +------------------------+     +------------------------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 63                      0      63                      0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//          Imm                   (Imm &gt;&gt; (48 - LZ) &amp; 0xffff)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// +----sext-----|--16-bit--+     +clear-|-----------------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// |11111111111111bbbbbbbbb1| -&gt;  |00000001bbbbbbbbb1111111|</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// +------------------------+     +------------------------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 63                      0      63                      0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LI8: sext many leading zeros   RLDICL: rotate left (48 - LZ), clear left LZ</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((LZ + TO) &gt; 48) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Since the immediates with (LZ &gt; 32) have been handled by previous</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// patterns, here we have (LZ &lt;= 32) to make sure we will not shift right</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the Imm by a negative value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(LZ &lt;= 32 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Unexpected shift value.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                 &#123;ones&#125;&#123;15-bit value&#125;&#123;ones&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We can take advantage of LI&#39;s sign-extension semantics to generate leading</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// |00011110bbbbbbbbb1111111| -&gt;  |000000000011110bbbbbbbbb|</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// +------------------------+     +------------------------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 63                      0      63                      0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//            Imm                    (Imm &gt;&gt; TO) &amp; 65535</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// +----sext-----|--16-bit--+     +LZ|---------------------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// |111111111111110bbbbbbbbb| -&gt;  |00011110bbbbbbbbb1111111|</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LI8: sext many leading zeros   RLDICL: rotate left TO, clear left LZ</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2-6) Patterns : &#123;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#125;&#123;49 zeros&#125;&#123;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                 &#123;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#125;&#123;49 ones&#125;&#123;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the Imm contains 49 consecutive zeros/ones, it means that a total of 15</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bits remain on both sides. Rotate right the Imm to construct an int&lt;16&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// value, use LI for int&lt;16&gt; value and then use RLDICL without mask to rotate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it back.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1) findContiguousZerosAtLeast(Imm, 49)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// +------|--zeros-|------+     +---ones--||---15 bit--+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// |bbbbbb0000000000aaaaaa| -&gt;  |0000000000aaaaaabbbbbb|</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// +----------------------+     +----------------------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 63                    0      63                    0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2) findContiguousZerosAtLeast(~Imm, 49)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// +------|--ones--|------+     +---ones--||---15 bit--+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// |bbbbbb1111111111aaaaaa| -&gt;  |1111111111aaaaaabbbbbb|</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// +----------------------+     +----------------------+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 63                    0      63                    0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((Shift = <a href="#ab2ac86b2700995733bbb9bbbe48641fa">findContiguousZerosAtLeast</a>(Imm, 49)) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><span class="doxyHighlight">      (Shift = <a href="#ab2ac86b2700995733bbb9bbbe48641fa">findContiguousZerosAtLeast</a>(~Imm, 49))) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t RotImm = APInt(64, Imm).rotr(Shift).getZExtValue();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/mem2reg-cpp/#a6fde3eb6ca09ddf2fd76432176d817bb">Register</a> TmpReg = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>.createVirtualRegister(&amp;PPC::G8RCRegClass);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                 &#123;ones&#125;&#123;31-bit value&#125;&#123;zeros&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We can take advantage of LIS&#39;s sign-extension semantics to generate leading</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ones, add the remaining bits with ORI, and then use RLDIC to mask off the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ones in both sides after rotation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="469"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((LZ + FO + TZ) &gt; 32) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 3-2) Pattern : &#123;zeros&#125;&#123;31-bit value&#125;&#123;ones&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Shift right the Imm by (32 - LZ) bits to construct a negative 32 bits</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// value, therefore we can take advantage of LIS&#39;s sign-extension semantics,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// add the remaining bits with ORI, and then mask them off after rotation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is similar to Pattern 2-3, please refer to the diagram there.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((LZ + TO) &gt; 32) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Since the immediates with (LZ &gt; 32) have been handled by previous</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// patterns, here we have (LZ &lt;= 32) to make sure we will not shift right</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the Imm by a negative value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(LZ &lt;= 32 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Unexpected shift value.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 3-5) Patterns : &#123;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#125;&#123;33 zeros&#125;&#123;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                 &#123;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#125;&#123;33 ones&#125;&#123;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#42;&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the Imm contains 33 consecutive zeros/ones, it means that a total of 31</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bits remain on both sides. Rotate right the Imm to construct an int&lt;32&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="567"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// value, use LIS + ORI for int&lt;32&gt; value and then use RLDICL without mask to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// rotate it back.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="569"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is similar to Pattern 2-6, please refer to the diagram there.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="570"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((Shift = <a href="#ab2ac86b2700995733bbb9bbbe48641fa">findContiguousZerosAtLeast</a>(Imm, 33)) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"><span class="doxyHighlight">      (Shift = <a href="#ab2ac86b2700995733bbb9bbbe48641fa">findContiguousZerosAtLeast</a>(~Imm, 33))) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t RotImm = APInt(64, Imm).rotr(Shift).getZExtValue();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t ImmHi16 = (RotImm &gt;&gt; 16) &amp; 0xffff;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Opcode = ImmHi16 ? PPC::LIS8 : PPC::LI8;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/mem2reg-cpp/#a6fde3eb6ca09ddf2fd76432176d817bb">Register</a> TmpReg = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>.createVirtualRegister(&amp;PPC::G8RCRegClass);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/mem2reg-cpp/#a6fde3eb6ca09ddf2fd76432176d817bb">Register</a> Tmp2Reg = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>.createVirtualRegister(&amp;PPC::G8RCRegClass);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a17e04afcf0c5efeb0eb6a9a45287b5e4">BuildMI</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.getDebugLoc(), TII.get(Opcode), TmpReg)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><span class="doxyHighlight">             .<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#a6c1f959947905135c7dd215b64957654">addImm</a>(ImmHi16)</span></CodeLine>
